00022 #ifndef _MAS5ReportDataAccessor_HEADER_
00023 #define _MAS5ReportDataAccessor_HEADER_
00024 
00025 /*! \file MAS5ReportDataAccessor.h Defines a class to access the MAS5 results. */
00026 
00027 #include "mas5-stat/src/ExpressionAlgorithmImplementation.h"
00028 //
00029 #include "exp_report/src/ReportDataAccessor.h"
00030 //
00031 
00032 /*! A class to access the MAS5 results. */
00033 class MAS5ReportDataAccessor : public ExpressionReport::ReportDataAccessor
00034 {
00035 private:
00036         /*! The expression results. */
00037         CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation *exp;
00038 
00039 public:
00040         /*! Sets the expression results. */
00041         MAS5ReportDataAccessor(CExpressionAlgorithmImplementation *data) { exp = data; }
00042         
00043         /*! Gets the number of expression probe sets. */
00044         int GetNumProbeSets() { return exp->GetNumResults(); }
00045 
00046         /*! Gets the number of used probe pairs in a probe set.
00047          * @param index The probe set index.
00048          * @return The number of probe pairs.
00049          */
00050         int GetNumPairs(int index)
00051         {
00052                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetAbsStatResult(index);
00053                 return result->NumUsedPairs;
00054         }
00055 
00056         /*! Checks if a probe set is targeting an anti-sense target.
00057          * @param index The probe set index.
00058          * @return True if the probe set is designed to interrogate an anti-sense target.
00059          */
00060         bool IsAntiSense(int index)
00061         {
00062                 std::string name = exp->GetProbeSetName(index);
00063                 std::string ext = name.substr(name.length()-2, 2);
00064                 if (ext == "AT" || ext == "at")
00065                         return true;
00066                 return false;
00067         }
00068 
00069         /*! Gets the probe set signal value
00070          * @param index The probe set index.
00071          * @return The signal value.
00072          */
00073         float GetSignal(int index)
00074         {
00075                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetAbsStatResult(index);
00076                 return result->Signal;
00077         }
00078 
00079         /*! Gets the probe set detection value
00080          * @param index The probe set index.
00081          * @return The detection value.
00082          */
00083         DetectionCall GetDetection(int index)
00084         {
00085                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetAbsStatResult(index);
00086                 return (DetectionCall) result->Detection;
00087         }
00088 
00089         /*! Checks if the data has comparison results.
00090          * @return True if comparison data exists.
00091          */
00092         bool HasComparisonData() { return exp->DoesCompDataExists(); }
00093 
00094         /*! Gets the probe set detection value for the baseline file.
00095          * @param index The probe set index.
00096          * @return The detection value.
00097          */
00098         DetectionCall GetBaselineDetection(int index)
00099         {
00100                 AbsStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetBaselineAbsStatResult(index);
00101                 return (DetectionCall) result->Detection;
00102         }
00103 
00104         /*! Gets the change call.
00105          * @param index The probe set index.
00106          * @return The change call.
00107          */
00108         ChangeCall GetChange(int index)
00109         {
00110                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetCompStatResult(index);
00111                 return (ChangeCall) result->Change;
00112         }
00113 
00114         /*! Gets the signal log ratio.
00115          * @param index The probe set index.
00116          * @return The SLR value.
00117          */
00118         float GetSignalLogRatio(int index)
00119         {
00120                 CompStatExpressionProbeSetResultType *result = exp->GetCompStatResult(index);
00121                 return result->SignalLogRatio;
00122         }
00123 
00124         /*! Determines if the direction is anti-sense.
00125          * @return True if anti-sense.
00126          */
00127         bool IsAntiSense()
00128         {
00129                 int antiSenseCount = 0;
00130                 int n = exp->GetNumResults();
00131                 for (int i=0; i<n; i++)
00132                 {
00133                         if (IsAntiSense(i) == true)
00134                                 ++antiSenseCount;
00135                 }
00136                 return (antiSenseCount > n/2);
00137         }
00138 
00139     /*! Don't return anything here. The control (central/corner) probe setse
00140      * get reported in the MAS5 algorithm.
00141      * @param qctype The type of QC probe set.
00142      * @return The list of intensities.
00143      */
00144     std::vector<float> GetIntensities(QCProbeSetType qctype)
00145     {
00146         std::vector<float> v;
00147         return v;
00148     }
00149 
00150     /*! Gets the name of a probe set at the given index position.
00151      * @param index The probe set index.
00152      * @return The probe set name.
00153      */
00154     std::string GetProbeSetName(int index) { return ""; }
00155         
00156         bool IsLogScale()
00157         {
00158                 return false;
00159         }
00160 };
00161 
00162 #endif
